title.rendered: “Elimination of Key Hamas Activist and Accomplices in Joint IDF-Shin Bet Operation: Unmasking the Use of Civilian Shields in Gaza”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

In a joint operation of the IDF and the Shin Bet, a central activist in the Hamas terrorist organization who took part in the terrorist attack in the Gaza Strip on 10/7 was eliminated; five terrorists hiding in a school in the northern Strip were killed.

Led by the Gaza Division, the Military Intelligence Directorate and the Shin Bet, an Air Force aircraft attacked and eliminated in Khan Yunis the terrorist Ahmed Yasser Al-Kara, a central activist in the Hamas terrorist organization who led attacks and terrorist plots against IDF forces during the war and was being pursued by the Southern Division.
Al-Kara took part in the terrorist attack in the Gaza Strip on 10/7 and during the battle made many shooting attempts towards our forces in the Strip area.

During preparation for the attack, a child was spotted by Unit 414 near the terrorist, and the attack was immediately halted after identification.
After the child moved out of the building’s range, the attack was carried out in which two more terrorists were killed: Zuhayb Ra’ad Abu Riba, a celebrated terrorist in the Hamas terrorist organization, and Anas Mohammad Abu Rgela, a terrorist in the PFLP terrorist organization.

In addition, Air Force fighter jets, under the direction of Southern Command and the Intelligence Corps, eliminated five Hamas terrorists who operated from the school compound ‘Fahmi Algargawy’ in the Draj Tufah region in the northern Gaza Strip.
Among the terrorists killed in the attack, the terrorist Fadi Salim, head of propaganda for the terrorist organization’s Gaza Division.
Three more terrorists in the organization’s intelligence apparatus and another high-profile terrorist were killed alongside him.

This is another example of the cynical and clear use that the Hamas terrorist organization makes of civilian spaces and facilities, using the strip’s population as a human shield.

Attached is documentation of the attack on the building where the terrorist Ahmed Yasser Al-Kara was, and the cessation of the attack following the identification of a child in the area previously: https://bit.ly/3wJlryK
